column5: Finally got out for a few hours with the son.   Not a lot of perch, but some good size.
Dont look to happy. Did you wake him up to early? LOL
The boy don't know how to smile, cept when he's in his cups
Oh man nothing like a good old feed if fat fall perch !!!! ....thanks for the teaser now I'm hungry ...lol. Cheers

The boy don't know how to smile, cept when he's in his cups   Guess ya'll call him' LILUGLI' on the home front    Just kiddin --Hope to see you again @ Fishing For Tyler this year  Nice Yellow Perch BTW !  Cheers   ID1
As a matter of fact, many folks do.
